p: Both male and female adults were transferred to 3.8 l cardboard cartons upon emergence and housed together for 9 days under the different temperature regimes ( Figure 2) while being provided with sugar and water ad libitum. To stimulate blood feeding, the 9-day old females were starved of water and sugar 18 h before an infectious blood meal. We based our duration of starvation of the mosquitoes on a standard operating procedure (SOP) for rearing mosquitoes in our insectary.
